/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
